description: Everglades National Park is a special place that is home to many weird and wonderful plants and animals. Located in South Florida, the Everglades consist of several diverse and complex ecosystems. The Everglades provides students with a detailed look at the park and explains why it needs protection. This book can also be used to teach students how to identify main ideas and details as well as identify and use adjectives. The book and lesson are also available for Levels L and O.
